thread.title: Parkland students blast lawmakers: 'Nothing has happened'

title: Parkland students blast lawmakers: 'Nothing has happened'
text:
Parkland students blast lawmakers: 'Nothing has happened' 2:54am IST - 01:26
Students from Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School, including Charlie Mirsky and Alfonso Calderon, and other high school students across the U.S. spoke to Democrats on Capitol Hill Wednesday for a Gun Violence Prevention Task Force forum. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Students from Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School, including Charlie Mirsky and Alfonso Calderon, and other high school students across the U.S. spoke to Democrats on Capitol Hill Wednesday for a Gun Violence Prevention Task Force forum.
